description:
Add Requires field to Tick struct in internal/tick/tick.go

Field specification:
- Name: Requires
- Type: *string (pointer for optional/nullable)
- JSON tag: json:"requires,omitempty"
- Valid values: null, "approval", "review", "content"

Purpose: Pre-declared gate that must be passed before closing. Set at creation time, persists through the tick lifecycle. When agent signals COMPLETE on a tick with requires set, the engine sets awaiting to the requires value instead of closing.

Implementation notes:
- Add field after Manual field in struct
- Add validation in Validate() method for valid enum values
- Null/empty means no pre-declared gate (default behavior)
title: Add Requires field to Tick struct
